title: Will my rank be gold end of season if my lp is -3 at plat?
body: My lp is currently -3 at platinum 5 and season is about to end soon I am wondering by the end of the season will I be gold or plat

replies.body:
Yeeeaaaaa this is the only time you're gonna hear me say this, but I'm gonna go ahead and suggest that you stop playing at that rank xD!

If you play and lose games at 0 or less LP you run the risk of being demoted. Decay shouldn't kick in before the season ends (28 days from the last game you played in that ranked queue), so as long as you don't play and lose you'll end at Plat!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AByiA0bX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-23T20:48:07.079+0000)
>
> Yeeeaaaaa this is the only time you're gonna hear me say this, but I'm gonna go ahead and suggest that you stop playing at that rank xD!
> 
> If you play and lose games at 0 or less LP you run the risk of being demoted. Decay shouldn't kick in before the season ends (28 days from the last game you played in that ranked queue), so as long as you don't play and lose you'll end at Plat!

To be fair, your MMR has to be really bad to get demoted from Plat into Gold...
